name: Ed Edd n Eddy RPG
description:
Plot

Ed Edd n Eddy had been invited to a jawbreaker party by Kevin when they got there they discovered that the jawbreakers have been stolen by the Kankers and there's a gate that's blocking the entrance and the only way to open it is to collect the six jawbreaker crystals so now the eds must go on an epic ed-venture to six dungeons to collect the crystals so they can get back the stolen jawbreakers.
